study.name: Hefei Swan Lake Smart Government Affairs System
study.System Digital Twinned: Government Affairs; Transportation; Water Supply; Regional Planning; Tourism and Security
study.Description: This project is actually a three-dimensional simulation city, and it is also a comprehensive and intuitive investment promotion platform and enterprise service platform to help the government achieve refined governance.
study.3D Platform Features: Automatically Check and Alarm; The Maintenance Status of Damaged Air Conditioning Pipes Can Be Displayed In Real Time; Real-Time Environmental Monitoring; Personnel Position Management; Large-Scale Equipment Management; Production Efficiency Management ; Building System Control; Facility Management; Infrastructure Control; Utilities Information; Utilities Maintenance; Weather Analysis
study.Decision Making: Effectively Improve The Efficiency Of Coordination, Management, Service And Decision-Making.
